name: read strike and dip
desc: Read sampled locations with strike and dip values.

properties.name: Switch Property View
properties.desc: Edit the renderable (red) port properties for the module.

properties.name: Disk Thickness Percentage
properties.desc: The Disk Thickness Percentage sets the thickness of each disk to a factor of the coordinate extents of the model.

properties.name: Minimum Disk Radius
properties.desc: This sets the minimum radius for each disk. The coordinates are in model coordinates.

properties.name: Radius Extent
properties.desc: The disk radius is based upon a percentage of the x, y, and z extents of the model.

properties.name: Disk Resolution
properties.desc: Number of prisms used to make each disk. The greater the number of prisms the more "round" the disk. Resolutions based on a factor of four are recommended as they will allow the dip and strike lines to end at the extents of the disk.

properties.name: Include Dip As Data
properties.desc: This allows you to color the Dip lines based upon the dip angle.

properties.name: Display Dip Lines
properties.desc: This toggle turns the Dip lines on and off.

properties.name: Include Strike As Data
properties.desc: This allows you to color the Strike lines based upon the strike

properties.name: Display Strike Lines
properties.desc: This toggle turns the Strike lines on and off.

properties.name: Connectivity Component
properties.desc: The Connectivity Component determines how SAD files are connected.

properties.name: Display Tubes
properties.desc: This toggle turns the tubes on and off.

properties.name: Tube Radius
properties.desc: This is the radius for the tubes, set by default to be 50 percent of the disk Radius Extent.

properties.name: Tube Resolution
properties.desc: This alters the number of sides each tube has, the more sides the more "round" the tubes will look, and possibly the slower they will display.

properties.name: Display Color
properties.desc: The Display Color selects the feature to color the disks and tubes by.

properties.name: Solid Disk Color
properties.desc: If the Solid Color feature is chosen as the Display Color, the color can be set using this control.

properties.name: Solid Tube Color
properties.desc: If the Solid Color feature is chosen as the Display Color, the color can be set using this control.

properties.name: Include Center Data
properties.desc: The Include Center Data toggle will tell the module to include the center point of each tube end point as a cell data component.  This allows the user to probe onto the tube and return its center instead of the position on the outside of the tube.
